data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) Pre Albuterol, New Offspring Spouse Exam 1, Omni 2 Exam 1. Spirometry was performed according to the contemporaneous standards of the American Thoracic Society.

variable.name: sdt_1
variable.comment: Date in dataset includes month , day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: fv1_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 1 second (FEV1) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: fv3_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 3 second (FEV3) - Best Effort

variable.name: fv6_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 6 second (FEV6) - Best Effort

variable.name: fvc_1
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: tfvc_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Time - Highest FVC value among acceptable maneuvers
variable.comment: Forced expiratory time of the acceptable maneuver with the highest FVC.

variable.name: rfev_1
variable.comment: FEV reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Reproducibility criteria was not met: two highest FEV values were not within 0.155 liters (> = 0.155 L)
Reproducibility criteria was met: two highest FEV values were within 0.155 liters (<0.155 L)

variable.name: rfvc_1
variable.comment: FVC reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Reproducibility criteria was not met: two highest FVC values were not within 0.155 liters (> = 0.155 L)
Reproducibility criteria was met: two highest FVC values were within 0.155 liters (<0.155 L)

variable.name: rbb_1
variable.description: Ratio Best FEV1 / Best FVC (calculated variable)
variable.comment: Best FEV1 and Best FVC can come from different acceptable efforts.

variable.name: mmf_1
variable.description: Maximum Mid Expiratory Flow Rate - Best Effort

variable.name: ff1_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 25% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) - Best Effort

variable.name: ff2_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 50% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) - Best Effort

variable.name: ff3_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 75% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) - Best Effort
